date: 3.25.2019
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
#import trawl dataset

trawl <- read.csv("./data/trawl_data.csv")

#summarize data by station, counting number of unique species and totaling abundances

trawl_summary <- trawl %>% group_by(STATION_ID) %>% summarize(n_distinct(SP_CODE), sum(ABUND_AREA))

#rename columns

names(trawl_summary) <- c("STATION_ID", "NUMBER_SPP", "TOTAL_ABUNDANCE")

#view results 

View(trawl_summary)
```
